name: Hotel Falier

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Paid about $105CDN a night via expedia. Free continental breakfast was great. Location was quite a walk away from the square, but good price for staying inside Venice. Bring thongs or slippers... the washroom shower wets the WHOLE washroom (toilet, floor, sink and all)!!!!!
reviews.title: Bring thongs/slippers!!!!!

likes.disliked: — location, was kind of a maze to get to the square

reviews.text: As a result of abandoning the terrible al sole hotel we went to the nearest which was the Falier Hotel. Friendly and helpful staff, clean, warm and in a great location. Also cheaper than the previously mentioned flea pit. I would highly recommend this small but lovely hotel.
reviews.title: Lovely!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at the Hotel Falier after just a ten minute walk from the train station along the beautiful Grand Canal, putting us right away in the Venitian spirit. The staff was very friendly and showed us to our immaculate, quiet and cozy room on the ground floor of the building. Our room did not have much light as opposed to those facing the front of the hotel, but we actually appreciated being on the cooler side of the building and kept the room in spite of the hotel's willingness to move us to a sunnier one (we arrived in the middle of a European heat wave!).
reviews.title: Home away from Home

likes.liked: — Location, clean and comfortable rooms, great staff.

reviews.text: And yes, there is good air conditioning in the rooms and lobby which made the hotel nice to come back to after a day of site-seeing under the sun.
reviews.title: Excellent value!

reviews.text: I didn't find the room or bathroom particularly small. The shower stall was smallish, but I have seen worse in Europe! Just across from the room was a door leading outside to a nice little garden set up with tables and ashtrays (Italy is now completely non-smoking indoors!).
reviews.title: Very good value

description: Superior 2 star boutique Hotel in the center of Venice, easy walk from the train station and the car terminal. Free wifi internet access, private bathroom, venetian decor.
